title: Belarus president appoints new culture minister
content:
MINSK, Nov. 19 (Xinhua) -- Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko appointed Anatoly Markevich as the new culture minister, the presidential press service said Thursday.
Markevich previously served as a president's assistant in the southwestern Brest region, which is well-known for its historic sites and important historical events.
Markevich is replacing Yuri Bondar, who had headed the Ministry of Culture for three years. Enditem
